group_1.narration: "Finally I made my way to visit Iroha@and Ui's parents in Takarazaki City."

group_1.textCenter: I know…you must have a lot of questions and@things you want to say…

group_1.textLeft: Ah… Yes, we do…
It's just, I don't know where to start…

group_1.textRight: To be honest, I was rather shocked to hear@about Magical Girls from Iroha and Ui…

group_1.textLeft: But they both seemed very serious.
And we've never had any trouble with those@girls making up lies…

group_1.textRight: I think it's natural that you weren't able to@believe them right away.

group_1.textLeft: After Iroha and Ui disappeared,
we went to talk to Touka's father and uncle.
And now I think we fully understand this@isn't some lie or trick…
And yet… When I look at their vacant room,
I can't seem to accept that they're really gone…
Although we were told that their decision@would save everyone,
it's still so sad to see them leave us like this…
…To tell you the truth, even if everyone in@the world is saved now,
because Iroha and Ui aren't here with us,
I don't think the two of us will ever be@truly happy again…
…Honey, not in front of Miss Nanami…
No, it's not…@I don't think this is anyone's fault.
And you know, sometimes I can find the@silver lining in all of this.
The two of them were my greatest treasures,@and I miss them every single day, but…
This calm, everyday life. People's smiling faces.@These little things that bring joy to everyone.
The two of them are working so hard to@protect this world.
Living here warms my heart and helps me@feel close to them.
If everyone can live in this world in peace,
then those kids made the right decision.

group_1.textRight: Um… So the reason I'm here today…
I'm here to give you something from your@daughters.

group_1.textLeft: A planetarium projector lamp…?
It looks handmade. And this here is…
Ah… A family portrait!

group_1.textRight: This is something that Ui drew…

group_1.textLeft: Then this lamp is also…

group_1.textRight: Iroha said she made it by hand.
"Please hang the portrait up and shine@the stars on the ceiling and walls."
They said that you should both look at them@whenever you're feeling lonely.
And that they'd always be watching over@their mom and dad.

group_1.textLeft: O-oh…

group_1.textRight: You mom… All she could think about was@how lonely she was…
When the two of you must've been missing@us as well…

group_1.textLeft: You both truly…cared about everyone,@everywhere…
We're so glad that the two of you grew up@to be such kind and lovely daughters…
Thank you, Miss Nanami…
Please send our regards to everyone at@Mikazuki Villa.
It's thanks to you that our daughters were@able to live happily with everyone there.
